sub_tasks.requirements: Multi-Phase Indexing Pipeline
Document Processing and Text Unit Composition
Multi-format input data ingestion with schema validation (Plain Text, CSV, JSON)
Configurable text chunking with document metadata preservation and hierarchical text unit creation
LLM-Driven Graph Extraction Workflow
Core Graph Extraction
Prompt-driven entity identification with configurable schemas
Relationship extraction with semantic typing and weights
Entity and relationship description summarization
Optional claim extraction for factual assertions linked to source text
Graph pruning and quality filtering based on configurable rules
Community Detection and Graph Augmentation
Hierarchical community clustering using Leiden algorithm with configurable parameters
Community-based graph partitioning and table generation
Graph embedding generation for network visualization (e.g., UMAP)
Community Summarization and Report Generation
LLM-based community report synthesis with metadata
Hierarchical report summarization across multiple community levels
Embedding Generation and Vector Store Integration
Dense vector embedding of text units and entities for semantic operations
Vector store configuration and indexing for efficient retrieval
Pre-structured Graph Ingestion Workflow (FastGraphRAG)
External graph import with schema mapping and custom entity/relationship table ingestion
Integration of pre-defined graphs into augmentation pipeline for community detection and summarization
Output Persistence and Knowledge Model
Structured data serialization into tabular format (entities, relationships, communities, reports)
Configurable output storage backends with incremental indexing capabilities
Multi-Modal Query Engine Architecture
Local Search Engine
Entity-centric retrieval using vector similarity for relevant entity identification
Context assembly from local graph neighborhood, related entities and relationships
LLM-based answer synthesis using local context and associated text
Global Search Engine
Community report-based reasoning leveraging hierarchical summaries for whole-dataset analysis
Hierarchical community traversal for comprehensive coverage and pattern identification
Dataset-wide synthesis by drilling down from high-level contexts to specific text
DRIFT Search Engine
Hybrid local-global search combination strategy for comprehensive responses
Dynamic search mode selection based on query characteristics
Auxiliary Query Features
Baseline vector-search-only retrieval over raw text chunks
Multi-index search capability for cross-dataset reasoning and knowledge integration
Entity-based question generation for proactive query synthesis and evaluation
Configuration and Workflow Management System
Centralized Configuration Management
Comprehensive schema defining all parameters for indexing workflows, storage, and query strategies
Configuration loading from environment variables and dedicated settings files
Standard vs FastGraphRAG indexing method selection
Language Model Integration Framework
Multi-provider LLM support with unified interface beyond single providers
Model selection and override mechanisms with proxy API support for non-OpenAI models
Storage and Caching Architecture
LLM response caching for cost optimization and speed improvement on iterative runs
Vector store integration for persistent text embeddings
Execution Interfaces
Command-Line Interface (CLI) for executing indexing pipeline and system utilities
Python API for programmatic control and integration into custom applications
Prompt Engineering and Optimization System
Manual Prompt Customization Framework
Indexing Prompt Templates
Entity/relationship extraction prompts with token substitution
Community report generation prompts
Claim extraction prompts
Query Prompt Templates
Local search reasoning prompts
Global search synthesis prompts
DRIFT search hybrid prompts
Manual override capability for any default prompt template
Automated Prompt Tuning Engine
Document selection strategies for prompt optimization with data sampling
Performance-based prompt refinement through variation generation and evaluation
Knowledge Model and Data Schema
Core Knowledge Graph Schema
Entity table with attributes and embeddings
Relationship table with semantic types and weights
Community table with hierarchical clustering data
Text units table linking documents to graph elements
Extended Knowledge Artifacts
Community reports table with generated summaries and metadata
Documents table with metadata and provenance information
Claims table for factual assertions (optional component)
Visualization and Analysis Tools
Graph Visualization Pipeline
Gephi integration for network analysis with community-based coloring and layout
Node sizing by centrality metrics
